# Phylactery of Negative Channeling
## Overview
**Aura** Aura moderate necromancy \[evil]; **CL** 10th

**Slot** headband

**Price** 11,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This item is a boon to any character able to channel negative energy, increasing the amount of damage dealt to living creatures by +2d6. This also increases the amount of damage healed by undead creatures.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], creator must be a 10th-level cleric

**Cost** 5,500 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 525
